alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:59PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 559 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Box Elder, or 14 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Viewfield around 615 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include New Underwood. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 67 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
